oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Antoinette Polk
Baronne de Charette
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Oval portrait of Antoinette Polk standing beside a stool and desk

Antoinette Polk, Baronne de Charette, in the days after she was awarded Abel Streight's brigade banner by Nathan Bedford Forrest. Polk earned the recognition for her bravery in alterting the Confederate wounded recovering at Ashwood that a Union unit was approaching the area.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Polk, Antoinette; Portraits; Women
Capturing the Flag
